import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState,useCallback}from"react";import{Chessground}from"chessground";import{Chess}from"chess.js";import StockfishEngine from"./StockfishEngine";import"../../node_modules/chessground/assets/chessground.base.css";import"../../node_modules/chessground/assets/chessground.brown.css";import"../../node_modules/chessground/assets/chessground.cburnett.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChessBoard=()=>{const boardRef=useRef(null);const chess=useRef(new Chess());const groundRef=useRef(null);// Store Chessground instance
const[topMoves,setTopMoves]=useState([]);// Store Stockfish's top moves
// Create a callback for the evaluation
const handleEvaluation=useCallback(data=>{const parsedMoves=parseStockfishOutput(data);setTopMoves(parsedMoves);},[]);// Initialize Stockfish Engine - Fix the usage
const engine=StockfishEngine({onEvaluation:handleEvaluation});// Initialize Chessground
useEffect(()=>{if(!groundRef.current){groundRef.current=Chessground(boardRef.current,{fen:chess.current.fen(),orientation:"white",movable:{free:false,dests:getDests(),events:{after:(orig,dest)=>handleMove(orig,dest)}},highlight:{lastMove:true,check:true}});}// Cleanup on unmount
return()=>{if(groundRef.current){groundRef.current.destroy();}};},[]);// Run only once on mount
// Handle player moves
const handleMove=(orig,dest)=>{const move=chess.current.move({from:orig,to:dest,promotion:"q"});if(move===null){console.log("Invalid move");return"snapback";}// Update the board state
groundRef.current.set({fen:chess.current.fen()});// Trigger Stockfish analysis
analyzePosition();};// Get possible legal moves
const getDests=()=>{const dests=new Map();chess.current.moves({verbose:true}).forEach(move=>{if(!dests.has(move.from))dests.set(move.from,[]);dests.get(move.from).push(move.to);});return dests;};// Use engine.sendCommand instead of destructuring
const analyzePosition=()=>{engine.sendCommand("position fen ".concat(chess.current.fen()));engine.sendCommand("go depth 15");};// Parse Stockfish output for best moves
const parseStockfishOutput=output=>{const moveRegex=/pv\s+([a-h][1-8][a-h][1-8])\s/g;let moves=[];let match;while((match=moveRegex.exec(output))!==null){moves.push(match[1]);}return moves.slice(0,5);// Get top 5 moves
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:boardRef,style:{width:"400px",height:"400px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:"200px",marginLeft:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Top Moves"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:topMoves.map((move,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:move},index))})]})]});};export default ChessBoard;
